description:
The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy’s team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abschied vom Elefanten – Sanjis Rettung beginnt!
Les adieux et la descente de l`éléphant. L`expédition pour récupérer Sanji !
Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!
Wakare no Gezou: Sanji Dakkan no Funade!
Спуск со слона! Курс на возвращение Санджи!
الوداع والنّزول من الفيل! الإبحار لاسترجاع سانجي!
別れの下象 サンジ奪還の船出!
